The Catholic Church needs to change some things. Many people are leaving the Church. The Church is not kind to many things. Like gay marriage, abortion and birth control. The Church has strong views on these things. But the views are old. If the Church changed, they would not lose people.

Many people are leaving the Church because of its views on these things. People do not agree with the Church. People think the Church is wrong.

The Church is against abortion. If you like abortion, you might not like being in the Church. The same is true for gay marriage. If you support gay marriage, you might not like being in the Church.

I think women can be priests. I think priests should be married. This might not have stopped bad things from happening.  But it is good to think about.

Priests are like everyone else. They work and they have families. Priests should have both.

I think gay marriage is good. I do not think people choose to be gay.  It is good to let people love who they want.

I think it is wrong to say only men and women can get married. It is not fair. I do not think the government should say who can marry.

I think people are born gay. I was born straight.  

It is not fair to make people feel bad for being gay. They should not be punished.

Gay marriage should be legal. There is no good reason not to allow it. Some people say that gay couples are bad for families. But this is not true. Gay couples are different, but that does not make them bad. It is like two sides of the same coin. They are different, but they are still the same.  

People have many rights that come with marriage. For example, they can share property and health care. If you are in a gay couple, your partner may not have these rights if you are sick. This is unfair. If you love someone and spend your life with them, they should have these rights.

There are many studies that show gay couples are like straight couples. They have happy relationships. They are just as good at being parents. Gay marriage is about a legal document, not a church ceremony. 

The government should not decide what is right or wrong for people's religion. If the government allows civil unions, it should also allow marriage. It is like segregation. Separate is not equal.

Some people worry about gay people adopting children. But children of gay couples will be like children of straight couples. They will be happy and healthy. Some people are afraid that gay people will hurt children. But this is not true. 

The government should make gay marriage legal in every state. All people should have the same rights. Laws should not be based on religion.

Some people think gay people are sick. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says that being gay is not a disease. People should listen to experts, not their friends or neighbors.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see drugs that are illegal. Some are good for people. Marijuana is like this.

Drugs can be good for people. Some are bad for people. I think marijuana can be good for some people. 

We use drugs in the pharmacy that are illegal.  We use oxycotton, Vicodin, Percocet. These are good for people.

I think we should use marijuana for medicine. It can help people.

I think alcohol is bad. Marijuana is bad too. But both can be used well.

We should make marijuana legal slowly. Then people can use it safely. 

People think marijuana is bad. It is not as bad as heroin or cocaine.

If marijuana is legal, people can use it safely.

The church has changed much. It is not as strict as before. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a nice dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends there on the weekends. We would go to church together.

Now, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes long. People dress more casually. In summer, some people come in beach clothes. Families arrive late.

I used to dress up for church, even in the morning. Now, people wear jeans and khakis. It is more casual.

That is the biggest change I see.

I do not know about the church's politics.

Regarding the bad things priests have done, I do not think the church could have stopped this. Some married men become bad. They still like young children.

Becoming a priest is a choice. Some religions allow priests to marry. If someone wants to marry and practice their faith, they should join a different religion.

I think some people are born this way. It is in their genes. They cannot hide it. Marriage may help, but it is not a solution.

If the church knew about these problems and covered them up, that is wrong.

I felt bad about the Iraq War. Many people felt bad. We went to war after the September 11th attacks. 

The Bush leaders said the war was about Osama Bin Laden and the attacks. They said Saddam Hussein had bad weapons. This was not true.

It made me mad. The Bush leaders lied to us. Even Colin Powell said he was not sure about the evidence.

This is wrong. It is bad to lie to the people.

The Bush leaders did not care about the rules of our country. They wanted to go to war. They wanted to hurt Saddam Hussein. They wanted more oil.

The war lasted too long. It is bad to leave now. Iraq might have a big fight.

The United Nations and the United States want other countries to help. They want Syria and Saudi Arabia to help.

This is not a good idea. It will cause more problems. Iraq should be in charge of itself. 

The government in Iraq is not strong. The people in charge are not good. 

There are many groups fighting for power. This makes things worse.

The war in Iraq is hard to talk about. I do not like it. I think it is not a real war. We did not say it was a war. We should not be there. We help them to make a new country, but it takes time. It is hard to make a good country. We want good things from Iraq, like oil. But now people are not happy. 

Some people say we should leave, but if we leave, they will be mad. They need our help. We need to stay and help them. But it is not easy. 

We spend a lot of money. It is not fair to the people who are fighting. I feel bad for the president. He is doing his best, but it is hard. We need to think about what is right.

The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. It is hard to say if it is right or wrong.  We need to think about the people in Iraq. They need help. But we also need to think about our country.

I think it is not right to make this thing legal. I don’t think a state should say it is legal. I think this is for the churches. The Constitution says the church and state should be separate. It is clear. I think trying to make laws about this is wrong. It goes against what the Constitution says. 

People who want to make it illegal are picking one church over others. Most Catholics and Christians are against it.  I don’t think the government should say what churches can and cannot do.

Separation of church and state is important. It lets people have different religions in the United States. Even though they want to make a change to the Constitution, I think that is wrong. It goes against what is already there.

This change would be different. It would stop people from doing things. I don't think the government should be involved in this. I don’t know why he wants to change the Constitution. I think he does not like it because he is Catholic. He likes one religion more than others.

I think the churches should decide. Not the president or anyone else in the government. There is no good reason to change the Constitution about this. I don’t think it will help the economy. It might even help society.

The war in Iraq is hard. The government did not tell the people the real reason for the war. They said it was about the attacks on September 11th. But the war was not about that. The government made people afraid and angry. They wanted to start a war.

I am against war. I do not like fighting. The war in Iraq was like the war in Vietnam. The government should have learned from the Vietnam War. Many soldiers died in Iraq. It is very sad.

The government took over the Iraqi government. They wanted to make Iraq a democracy. But they were not ready for what came next. There was no plan for after the war.

The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The United States tried to change the government. It was hard. 

The government did not plan well. They should have thought about what would happen after the war. They did not tell the people the truth. They said it would be a short war, but it is still going on.

Iraq is a hard place to change. It took a long time for the United States to become a democracy. It was hard work.

The government should have known that changing Iraq would be hard. They should have been honest with the people.

It is hard to know what to do now. The war has been going on for a long time. Many soldiers have died. We should try to help Iraq, but we should also think about our own people.

I support gay marriage. I have always done so.

I think it is a private choice. People are born this way. It is not right to take away rights from people because of who they love.

I think the government should not tell people who they can marry. It is a personal matter.

I know gay couples who live in my neighborhood. They are like any other family. They walk their dogs and enjoy life.

I do not like when politicians try to control people's lives. Marriage is between two people who love each other.

I have read that some people are born with a different brain chemistry. This makes them gay. It is not a choice.

Marriage is a private matter. It is not the government's business.

The internet is open to everyone. When you put things on the internet, people can see them. 

This can be a problem. If you write about bad things, people may worry. Schools must be careful. If someone says they will do something bad, the school must act. 

It is hard to know what is serious and what is a joke. Sometimes people say things they do not mean.

But sometimes, people say things that are very serious. The school may see these things on the internet. This is not an invasion of privacy.

People must think before they post things on the internet. If you do not want people to see something, do not put it online.

The war has gone on too long.  I think the reason for the war was good at the start.  The goal was to help another country have a fair system of government. But I think we have lost sight of that reason. We may now fight just to show we are strong.  I think the reasons for going to war may not have been fair. They may have been connected to old problems between President Bush’s father and Saddam Hussein.

If the goal was to help a country without fair government, that would be a good reason to fight. But I think the reason for fighting has changed. It is not clear why we are still fighting. I think we showed our strength in the early months of the war.

I think we should end the war.  The people in that country will have to protect themselves someday. They need to learn to do this on their own. We have spent too much money on this war. We have problems here at home, like poverty. We should spend our money on these problems.

War is not cheap. We spend billions of dollars on it.  We should spend this money on other things, like schools, roads, and health care. We have many problems in our country that need money. We should not spend money on a war that we no longer need to fight.

Can I ask a question?

I think it is okay that someone looked at the Myspace page. If you put things on the internet, it is for people to see. I know on Myspace you must be friends with someone to see their page. But if you are friends, you let them see it. 

It is good that someone saw the information and stopped something bad.

It is hard to know if it is right to look at everyone's pages to stop bad things. It can be mean to look at pages just to see what people are doing.

But if someone is looking for proof that someone is doing something bad, it is different.

I have a Facebook. I worry about people who look at my page. I saw on TV a man who got a girl's name and talked to her on the internet very fast. He met her.

I would not meet someone like that. I have had people in my classes talk to me on Facebook even though I don't know them. They know my name, my class schedule, and my friends.

It is hard. I like to use Facebook to talk to friends but I worry about what people see. 

My roommate said her high school banned Myspace. I think it is strange for a school to tell students they cannot use Myspace.

I feel bad about the Iraq War. Many people think it was a bad idea. 

Most people in the world, Iraq, and even U.S. troops there now, think it was wrong. 

The war was bad before we went. It is still bad now.

It is hard to do anything good in the Middle East. The United States and Middle Eastern people are different.

The U.S. wanted to bring democracy to Iraq. But Iraqis did not want it. 

Saddam Hussein was bad, but we should think about the good and bad before we attack a country.

Iraq is like quicksand. We are stuck there.

I don't know what to say. I don't see why we should stay.

The government may have reasons, but I do not agree.

If we leave slowly over a year, it would be okay.

But Iraqis want us to leave now.

They know what is best for them.

If we ask them and they say leave, it is not our fault if things go wrong.

We can help them later.

We will never be good guys in the Middle East. But leaving would be better than staying.

Gender discrimination is still a problem in the United States. It is not just women.  It depends on the work.  

Women have it hard. There is a "glass roof." Even when there is equality, some people have a hard time working for a woman. This is because society has been this way for a long time. Women often see jobs they can do. They have the skills. But maybe the group that chooses who gets promoted will not pick a woman. This is because people do not think of women in high business jobs.

Men have it hard too. In some jobs, like fashion, men are not taken seriously. This is because people think fashion is for women. If a man has a "normal" man's lifestyle and is in fashion, people think he does not understand women's fashion.

In some jobs, men are not respected if they stay home with the children. People think men should work and be the money maker. But maybe the wife has the better job.  

It is hard to change this. Society has old ideas. But things are getting better.  More women are in high jobs. More men are stay-at-home dads.  People are starting to accept this.

We need to show the good qualities of people who are usually judged. We cannot be too pushy, but we can show that they are good. If we force it, people will resist.

People did not make marijuana legal. They made it less bad. It is not a big crime any more. It is more like a bad ticket. If you get caught, you will not go to jail. You may have to pay a fine. 

Some people worry about the future if you have a marijuana charge. This is true even if it is not a big crime.

It costs a lot of money to arrest people, take them to jail, and have a court case. It is cheaper to let people go with a ticket.

Some towns do not want to make marijuana less bad. They do not like it.

In some towns, people are more open to marijuana. They think it is okay.

The town can use the money saved to help people. They can use it for schools or for the poor.

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is bad to smoke it and drive. It is still bad to smoke it in many places.

Alcohol is very bad for your body. Marijuana is bad for your life.

I like the Catholic Church. It is good to have old ways.

But it is good to grow and change too.

Some things the Church does are very old.

Some people think the Church is too strict.

They think the Church judges people who are not perfect.

The Church does not like people who have different beliefs.

My dad was not Catholic. My mom was Catholic.

The Church would not let them marry.

This is not kind to people with different beliefs.

The Church says to love everyone.

But the Church does not always love everyone.

This is wrong.

I think priests should be able to marry.

But I do not think this will stop bad things from happening.

Bad people do bad things.

Marriage does not stop bad things.

I am still thinking about this problem. I do not know if one side is right or wrong. But, this is a hard topic. It is hard to say how to join church and state. It is also hard to say what marriage is. I do not know. I think all civil unions are good. I do not know if marriage should be a law made by the government. Marriage is a religious thing. People do not get tax breaks or special things from the government just because they were baptized. So, I think marriage should be a civil union. It is two people. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is. They should just see that two people are together. 

I think if all states agree on this, they should make it a law for the whole country. But, I think it is wrong to change the Constitution to ban gay marriage. The Constitution is for big things. This is important to some people, but not important enough to change the Constitution. It is not fair to change the Constitution just to ban gay marriage.

I was raised in a family that is Christian.  
Homosexuality is hard for me to understand.  
I have many gay friends.  
I do not agree with their way of life.
But I think they should be able to marry.   
I do not think it is a problem for the whole country.  
I think each state should decide.  
Some states are Democratic. 
Some states are Republican. 
Democratic states want to let people marry who they want.  
If you live in a state that lets people marry, you must respect that.
I think homosexuals should have the same rights as other people.  
I think they should be able to marry if their state allows it.  

I have already said this.  
I think the president should not tell all states what to do.  
It should be up to each state.  
I do not think the president should say that all states must be against gay marriage.  
Each state should decide for itself.  
The president does not live in every state.  
I think some things should be up to each state.  
The president will not be in office forever.  
If a new president wants to change the law, they can.  
It is better for each state to decide.

Myspace is open to the public. People can see what is posted there. If you post on Myspace, you should know that others can see it. This includes school officials.

School officials saw the posts because they want to keep students safe. They have a job to protect students. If seeing the posts helps stop a school shooting, it is good.

It is different if officials look for bad things students do on Myspace just to punish them. That is an invasion of privacy.

But if it stops something bad from happening, it is not an invasion.

You should think before you post things online. Things on the internet stay there forever. 

People can find old posts even if they are trying to hide them. You should not post things you do not want others to see.

The war is bad. At first, I want to help after nine eleven. I want to fight. Now, I think we go there wrong. We not think about the future. We not have a plan.  We backfire.

I do not want to fight now. I think the people there fight with each other. They cannot fight us. We not help by being there.

I feel sad for them. They fight bad. I think they not human.

We go there not ready. We not know what to expect. War there different. They fight savage. They not want good things. They want us go away.

We go there for revenge. President Bush want to fight. He feel we must fight back.

I think we had to fight. They do bad things.

We could do better. We not have plan. We not know what to do. We not have one goal.

We go there angry. We make more anger.

They always fight. We not change them.

We stay too long. We hurt ourselves. We not make enough progress. We must go home.

The Catholic Church needs to change some things. Many people are leaving the Church. The Church is not kind to many things. Like gay marriage, abortion and birth control. The Church has strong views on these things. But the views are old. If the Church changed, they would not lose people.

Many people are leaving the Church because of its views on these things. People do not agree with the Church. People think the Church is wrong.

The Church is against abortion. If you like abortion, you might not like being in the Church. The same is true for gay marriage. If you support gay marriage, you might not like being in the Church.

I think women can be priests. I think priests should be married. This might not have stopped bad things from happening.  But it is good to think about.

Priests are like everyone else. They work and they have families. Priests should have both.

I think gay marriage is good. I do not think people choose to be gay.  It is good to let people love who they want.

I think it is wrong to say only men and women can get married. It is not fair. I do not think the government should say who can marry.

I think people are born gay. I was born straight.  

It is not fair to make people feel bad for being gay. They should not be punished.

Gay marriage should be legal. There is no good reason not to allow it. Some people say that gay couples are bad for families. But this is not true. Gay couples are different, but that does not make them bad. It is like two sides of the same coin. They are different, but they are still the same.  

People have many rights that come with marriage. For example, they can share property and health care. If you are in a gay couple, your partner may not have these rights if you are sick. This is unfair. If you love someone and spend your life with them, they should have these rights.

There are many studies that show gay couples are like straight couples. They have happy relationships. They are just as good at being parents. Gay marriage is about a legal document, not a church ceremony. 

The government should not decide what is right or wrong for people's religion. If the government allows civil unions, it should also allow marriage. It is like segregation. Separate is not equal.

Some people worry about gay people adopting children. But children of gay couples will be like children of straight couples. They will be happy and healthy. Some people are afraid that gay people will hurt children. But this is not true. 

The government should make gay marriage legal in every state. All people should have the same rights. Laws should not be based on religion.

Some people think gay people are sick. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says that being gay is not a disease. People should listen to experts, not their friends or neighbors.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see drugs that are illegal. Some are good for people. Marijuana is like this.

Drugs can be good for people. Some are bad for people. I think marijuana can be good for some people. 

We use drugs in the pharmacy that are illegal.  We use oxycotton, Vicodin, Percocet. These are good for people.

I think we should use marijuana for medicine. It can help people.

I think alcohol is bad. Marijuana is bad too. But both can be used well.

We should make marijuana legal slowly. Then people can use it safely. 

People think marijuana is bad. It is not as bad as heroin or cocaine.

If marijuana is legal, people can use it safely.

The church has changed much. It is not as strict as before. When I was young, I went to church every Sunday. I wore a nice dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school, and I saw my friends there on the weekends. We would go to church together.

Now, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes long. People dress more casually. In summer, some people come in beach clothes. Families arrive late.

I used to dress up for church, even in the morning. Now, people wear jeans and khakis. It is more casual.

That is the biggest change I see.

I do not know about the church's politics.

Regarding the bad things priests have done, I do not think the church could have stopped this. Some married men become bad. They still like young children.

Becoming a priest is a choice. Some religions allow priests to marry. If someone wants to marry and practice their faith, they should join a different religion.

I think some people are born this way. It is in their genes. They cannot hide it. Marriage may help, but it is not a solution.

If the church knew about these problems and covered them up, that is wrong.

I felt bad about the Iraq War. Many people felt bad. We went to war after the September 11th attacks. 

The Bush leaders said the war was about Osama Bin Laden and the attacks. They said Saddam Hussein had bad weapons. This was not true.

It made me mad. The Bush leaders lied to us. Even Colin Powell said he was not sure about the evidence.

This is wrong. It is bad to lie to the people.

The Bush leaders did not care about the rules of our country. They wanted to go to war. They wanted to hurt Saddam Hussein. They wanted more oil.

The war lasted too long. It is bad to leave now. Iraq might have a big fight.

The United Nations and the United States want other countries to help. They want Syria and Saudi Arabia to help.

This is not a good idea. It will cause more problems. Iraq should be in charge of itself. 

The government in Iraq is not strong. The people in charge are not good. 

There are many groups fighting for power. This makes things worse.

The war in Iraq is hard to talk about. I do not like it. I think it is not a real war. We did not say it was a war. We should not be there. We help them to make a new country, but it takes time. It is hard to make a good country. We want good things from Iraq, like oil. But now people are not happy. 

Some people say we should leave, but if we leave, they will be mad. They need our help. We need to stay and help them. But it is not easy. 

We spend a lot of money. It is not fair to the people who are fighting. I feel bad for the president. He is doing his best, but it is hard. We need to think about what is right.

The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. It is hard to say if it is right or wrong.  We need to think about the people in Iraq. They need help. But we also need to think about our country.

I think it is not right to make this thing legal. I don’t think a state should say it is legal. I think this is for the churches. The Constitution says the church and state should be separate. It is clear. I think trying to make laws about this is wrong. It goes against what the Constitution says. 

People who want to make it illegal are picking one church over others. Most Catholics and Christians are against it.  I don’t think the government should say what churches can and cannot do.

Separation of church and state is important. It lets people have different religions in the United States. Even though they want to make a change to the Constitution, I think that is wrong. It goes against what is already there.

This change would be different. It would stop people from doing things. I don't think the government should be involved in this. I don’t know why he wants to change the Constitution. I think he does not like it because he is Catholic. He likes one religion more than others.

I think the churches should decide. Not the president or anyone else in the government. There is no good reason to change the Constitution about this. I don’t think it will help the economy. It might even help society.

The war in Iraq is hard. The government did not tell the people the real reason for the war. They said it was about the attacks on September 11th. But the war was not about that. The government made people afraid and angry. They wanted to start a war.

I am against war. I do not like fighting. The war in Iraq was like the war in Vietnam. The government should have learned from the Vietnam War. Many soldiers died in Iraq. It is very sad.

The government took over the Iraqi government. They wanted to make Iraq a democracy. But they were not ready for what came next. There was no plan for after the war.

The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The United States tried to change the government. It was hard. 

The government did not plan well. They should have thought about what would happen after the war. They did not tell the people the truth. They said it would be a short war, but it is still going on.

Iraq is a hard place to change. It took a long time for the United States to become a democracy. It was hard work.

The government should have known that changing Iraq would be hard. They should have been honest with the people.

It is hard to know what to do now. The war has been going on for a long time. Many soldiers have died. We should try to help Iraq, but we should also think about our own people.

I support gay marriage. I have always done so.

I think it is a private choice. People are born this way. It is not right to take away rights from people because of who they love.

I think the government should not tell people who they can marry. It is a personal matter.

I know gay couples who live in my neighborhood. They are like any other family. They walk their dogs and enjoy life.

I do not like when politicians try to control people's lives. Marriage is between two people who love each other.

I have read that some people are born with a different brain chemistry. This makes them gay. It is not a choice.

Marriage is a private matter. It is not the government's business.

The internet is open to everyone. When you put things on the internet, people can see them. 

This can be a problem. If you write about bad things, people may worry. Schools must be careful. If someone says they will do something bad, the school must act. 

It is hard to know what is serious and what is a joke. Sometimes people say things they do not mean.

But sometimes, people say things that are very serious. The school may see these things on the internet. This is not an invasion of privacy.

People must think before they post things on the internet. If you do not want people to see something, do not put it online.

The war has gone on too long.  I think the reason for the war was good at the start.  The goal was to help another country have a fair system of government. But I think we have lost sight of that reason. We may now fight just to show we are strong.  I think the reasons for going to war may not have been fair. They may have been connected to old problems between President Bush’s father and Saddam Hussein.

If the goal was to help a country without fair government, that would be a good reason to fight. But I think the reason for fighting has changed. It is not clear why we are still fighting. I think we showed our strength in the early months of the war.

I think we should end the war.  The people in that country will have to protect themselves someday. They need to learn to do this on their own. We have spent too much money on this war. We have problems here at home, like poverty. We should spend our money on these problems.

War is not cheap. We spend billions of dollars on it.  We should spend this money on other things, like schools, roads, and health care. We have many problems in our country that need money. We should not spend money on a war that we no longer need to fight.

Can I ask a question?

I think it is okay that someone looked at the Myspace page. If you put things on the internet, it is for people to see. I know on Myspace you must be friends with someone to see their page. But if you are friends, you let them see it. 

It is good that someone saw the information and stopped something bad.

It is hard to know if it is right to look at everyone's pages to stop bad things. It can be mean to look at pages just to see what people are doing.

But if someone is looking for proof that someone is doing something bad, it is different.

I have a Facebook. I worry about people who look at my page. I saw on TV a man who got a girl's name and talked to her on the internet very fast. He met her.

I would not meet someone like that. I have had people in my classes talk to me on Facebook even though I don't know them. They know my name, my class schedule, and my friends.

It is hard. I like to use Facebook to talk to friends but I worry about what people see. 

My roommate said her high school banned Myspace. I think it is strange for a school to tell students they cannot use Myspace.

I feel bad about the Iraq War. Many people think it was a bad idea. 

Most people in the world, Iraq, and even U.S. troops there now, think it was wrong. 

The war was bad before we went. It is still bad now.

It is hard to do anything good in the Middle East. The United States and Middle Eastern people are different.

The U.S. wanted to bring democracy to Iraq. But Iraqis did not want it. 

Saddam Hussein was bad, but we should think about the good and bad before we attack a country.

Iraq is like quicksand. We are stuck there.

I don't know what to say. I don't see why we should stay.

The government may have reasons, but I do not agree.

If we leave slowly over a year, it would be okay.

But Iraqis want us to leave now.

They know what is best for them.

If we ask them and they say leave, it is not our fault if things go wrong.

We can help them later.

We will never be good guys in the Middle East. But leaving would be better than staying.

Gender discrimination is still a problem in the United States. It is not just women.  It depends on the work.  

Women have it hard. There is a "glass roof." Even when there is equality, some people have a hard time working for a woman. This is because society has been this way for a long time. Women often see jobs they can do. They have the skills. But maybe the group that chooses who gets promoted will not pick a woman. This is because people do not think of women in high business jobs.

Men have it hard too. In some jobs, like fashion, men are not taken seriously. This is because people think fashion is for women. If a man has a "normal" man's lifestyle and is in fashion, people think he does not understand women's fashion.

In some jobs, men are not respected if they stay home with the children. People think men should work and be the money maker. But maybe the wife has the better job.  

It is hard to change this. Society has old ideas. But things are getting better.  More women are in high jobs. More men are stay-at-home dads.  People are starting to accept this.

We need to show the good qualities of people who are usually judged. We cannot be too pushy, but we can show that they are good. If we force it, people will resist.

People did not make marijuana legal. They made it less bad. It is not a big crime any more. It is more like a bad ticket. If you get caught, you will not go to jail. You may have to pay a fine. 

Some people worry about the future if you have a marijuana charge. This is true even if it is not a big crime.

It costs a lot of money to arrest people, take them to jail, and have a court case. It is cheaper to let people go with a ticket.

Some towns do not want to make marijuana less bad. They do not like it.

In some towns, people are more open to marijuana. They think it is okay.

The town can use the money saved to help people. They can use it for schools or for the poor.

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is bad to smoke it and drive. It is still bad to smoke it in many places.

Alcohol is very bad for your body. Marijuana is bad for your life.

I like the Catholic Church. It is good to have old ways.

But it is good to grow and change too.

Some things the Church does are very old.

Some people think the Church is too strict.

They think the Church judges people who are not perfect.

The Church does not like people who have different beliefs.

My dad was not Catholic. My mom was Catholic.

The Church would not let them marry.

This is not kind to people with different beliefs.

The Church says to love everyone.

But the Church does not always love everyone.

This is wrong.

I think priests should be able to marry.

But I do not think this will stop bad things from happening.

Bad people do bad things.

Marriage does not stop bad things.

I am still thinking about this problem. I do not know if one side is right or wrong. But, this is a hard topic. It is hard to say how to join church and state. It is also hard to say what marriage is. I do not know. I think all civil unions are good. I do not know if marriage should be a law made by the government. Marriage is a religious thing. People do not get tax breaks or special things from the government just because they were baptized. So, I think marriage should be a civil union. It is two people. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is. They should just see that two people are together. 

I think if all states agree on this, they should make it a law for the whole country. But, I think it is wrong to change the Constitution to ban gay marriage. The Constitution is for big things. This is important to some people, but not important enough to change the Constitution. It is not fair to change the Constitution just to ban gay marriage.

I was raised in a family that is Christian.  
Homosexuality is hard for me to understand.  
I have many gay friends.  
I do not agree with their way of life.
But I think they should be able to marry.   
I do not think it is a problem for the whole country.  
I think each state should decide.  
Some states are Democratic. 
Some states are Republican. 
Democratic states want to let people marry who they want.  
If you live in a state that lets people marry, you must respect that.
I think homosexuals should have the same rights as other people.  
I think they should be able to marry if their state allows it.  

I have already said this.  
I think the president should not tell all states what to do.  
It should be up to each state.  
I do not think the president should say that all states must be against gay marriage.  
Each state should decide for itself.  
The president does not live in every state.  
I think some things should be up to each state.  
The president will not be in office forever.  
If a new president wants to change the law, they can.  
It is better for each state to decide.

Myspace is open to the public. People can see what is posted there. If you post on Myspace, you should know that others can see it. This includes school officials.

School officials saw the posts because they want to keep students safe. They have a job to protect students. If seeing the posts helps stop a school shooting, it is good.

It is different if officials look for bad things students do on Myspace just to punish them. That is an invasion of privacy.

But if it stops something bad from happening, it is not an invasion.

You should think before you post things online. Things on the internet stay there forever. 

People can find old posts even if they are trying to hide them. You should not post things you do not want others to see.

The war is bad. At first, I want to help after nine eleven. I want to fight. Now, I think we go there wrong. We not think about the future. We not have a plan.  We backfire.

I do not want to fight now. I think the people there fight with each other. They cannot fight us. We not help by being there.

I feel sad for them. They fight bad. I think they not human.

We go there not ready. We not know what to expect. War there different. They fight savage. They not want good things. They want us go away.

We go there for revenge. President Bush want to fight. He feel we must fight back.

I think we had to fight. They do bad things.

We could do better. We not have plan. We not know what to do. We not have one goal.

We go there angry. We make more anger.

They always fight. We not change them.

We stay too long. We hurt ourselves. We not make enough progress. We must go home.

I think people are born gay. I was born straight.  

It is not fair to make people feel bad for being gay. They should not be punished.

Gay marriage should be legal. There is no good reason not to allow it. Some people say that gay couples are bad for families. But this is not true. Gay couples are different, but that does not make them bad. It is like two sides of the same coin. They are different, but they are still the same.  

People have many rights that come with marriage. For example, they can share property and health care. If you are in a gay couple, your partner may not have these rights if you are sick. This is unfair. If you love someone and spend your life with them, they should have these rights.

There are many studies that show gay couples are like straight couples. They have happy relationships. They are just as good at being parents. Gay marriage is about a legal document, not a church ceremony. 

The government should not decide what is right or wrong for people's religion. If the government allows civil unions, it should also allow marriage. It is like segregation. Separate is not equal.

Some people worry about gay people adopting children. But children of gay couples will be like children of straight couples. They will be happy and healthy. Some people are afraid that gay people will hurt children. But this is not true. 

The government should make gay marriage legal in every state. All people should have the same rights. Laws should not be based on religion.

Some people think gay people are sick. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says that being gay is not a disease. People should listen to experts, not their friends or neighbors.

If marijuana is legal, people can use it safely.

Now, there is a special mass for teenagers. It is only thirty minutes long. People dress more casually. In summer, some people come in beach clothes. Families arrive late.

I used to dress up for church, even in the morning. Now, people wear jeans and khakis. It is more casual.

I do not know about the church's politics.

If the church knew about these problems and covered them up, that is wrong.

The Bush leaders said the war was about Osama Bin Laden and the attacks. They said Saddam Hussein had bad weapons. This was not true.

People must think before they post things on the internet. If you do not want people to see something, do not put it online.

The war has gone on too long.  I think the reason for the war was good at the start.  The goal was to help another country have a fair system of government. But I think we have lost sight of that reason. We may now fight just to show we are strong.  I think the reasons for going to war may not have been fair. They may have been connected to old problems between President Bush’s father and Saddam Hussein.

If the goal was to help a country without fair government, that would be a good reason to fight. But I think the reason for fighting has changed. It is not clear why we are still fighting. I think we showed our strength in the early months of the war.

I think we should end the war.  The people in that country will have to protect themselves someday. They need to learn to do this on their own. We have spent too much money on this war. We have problems here at home, like poverty. We should spend our money on these problems.

War is not cheap. We spend billions of dollars on it.  We should spend this money on other things, like schools, roads, and health care. We have many problems in our country that need money. We should not spend money on a war that we no longer need to fight.

Can I ask a question?

I think it is okay that someone looked at the Myspace page. If you put things on the internet, it is for people to see. I know on Myspace you must be friends with someone to see their page. But if you are friends, you let them see it. 

It is good that someone saw the information and stopped something bad.

It is hard to know if it is right to look at everyone's pages to stop bad things. It can be mean to look at pages just to see what people are doing.

But if someone is looking for proof that someone is doing something bad, it is different.

I have a Facebook. I worry about people who look at my page. I saw on TV a man who got a girl's name and talked to her on the internet very fast. He met her.

I would not meet someone like that. I have had people in my classes talk to me on Facebook even though I don't know them. They know my name, my class schedule, and my friends.

It is hard. I like to use Facebook to talk to friends but I worry about what people see. 

My roommate said her high school banned Myspace. I think it is strange for a school to tell students they cannot use Myspace.

I feel bad about the Iraq War. Many people think it was a bad idea. 

Most people in the world, Iraq, and even U.S. troops there now, think it was wrong. 

The war was bad before we went. It is still bad now.

It is hard to do anything good in the Middle East. The United States and Middle Eastern people are different.

The U.S. wanted to bring democracy to Iraq. But Iraqis did not want it. 

Saddam Hussein was bad, but we should think about the good and bad before we attack a country.

Iraq is like quicksand. We are stuck there.

I don't know what to say. I don't see why we should stay.

The government may have reasons, but I do not agree.

If we leave slowly over a year, it would be okay.

But Iraqis want us to leave now.

They know what is best for them.

If we ask them and they say leave, it is not our fault if things go wrong.

We can help them later.

We will never be good guys in the Middle East. But leaving would be better than staying.

Gender discrimination is still a problem in the United States. It is not just women.  It depends on the work.  

Women have it hard. There is a "glass roof." Even when there is equality, some people have a hard time working for a woman. This is because society has been this way for a long time. Women often see jobs they can do. They have the skills. But maybe the group that chooses who gets promoted will not pick a woman. This is because people do not think of women in high business jobs.

Men have it hard too. In some jobs, like fashion, men are not taken seriously. This is because people think fashion is for women. If a man has a "normal" man's lifestyle and is in fashion, people think he does not understand women's fashion.

In some jobs, men are not respected if they stay home with the children. People think men should work and be the money maker. But maybe the wife has the better job.  

It is hard to change this. Society has old ideas. But things are getting better.  More women are in high jobs. More men are stay-at-home dads.  People are starting to accept this.

We need to show the good qualities of people who are usually judged. We cannot be too pushy, but we can show that they are good. If we force it, people will resist.

People did not make marijuana legal. They made it less bad. It is not a big crime any more. It is more like a bad ticket. If you get caught, you will not go to jail. You may have to pay a fine. 

Some people worry about the future if you have a marijuana charge. This is true even if it is not a big crime.

It costs a lot of money to arrest people, take them to jail, and have a court case. It is cheaper to let people go with a ticket.

Some towns do not want to make marijuana less bad. They do not like it.

In some towns, people are more open to marijuana. They think it is okay.

The town can use the money saved to help people. They can use it for schools or for the poor.

Marijuana should not be everywhere. It is bad to smoke it and drive. It is still bad to smoke it in many places.

Alcohol is very bad for your body. Marijuana is bad for your life.

I like the Catholic Church. It is good to have old ways.

But it is good to grow and change too.

Some things the Church does are very old.

Some people think the Church is too strict.

They think the Church judges people who are not perfect.

The Church does not like people who have different beliefs.

My dad was not Catholic. My mom was Catholic.

The Church would not let them marry.

This is not kind to people with different beliefs.

The Church says to love everyone.

But the Church does not always love everyone.

This is wrong.

I think priests should be able to marry.

But I do not think this will stop bad things from happening.

Bad people do bad things.

Marriage does not stop bad things.

I am still thinking about this problem. I do not know if one side is right or wrong. But, this is a hard topic. It is hard to say how to join church and state. It is also hard to say what marriage is. I do not know. I think all civil unions are good. I do not know if marriage should be a law made by the government. Marriage is a religious thing. People do not get tax breaks or special things from the government just because they were baptized. So, I think marriage should be a civil union. It is two people. The government should not care what kind of marriage it is. They should just see that two people are together. 

I think if all states agree on this, they should make it a law for the whole country. But, I think it is wrong to change the Constitution to ban gay marriage. The Constitution is for big things. This is important to some people, but not important enough to change the Constitution. It is not fair to change the Constitution just to ban gay marriage.

I was raised in a family that is Christian.  
Homosexuality is hard for me to understand.  
I have many gay friends.  
I do not agree with their way of life.
But I think they should be able to marry.   
I do not think it is a problem for the whole country.  
I think each state should decide.  
Some states are Democratic. 
Some states are Republican. 
Democratic states want to let people marry who they want.  
If you live in a state that lets people marry, you must respect that.
I think homosexuals should have the same rights as other people.  
I think they should be able to marry if their state allows it.  

I have already said this.  
I think the president should not tell all states what to do.  
It should be up to each state.  
I do not think the president should say that all states must be against gay marriage.  
Each state should decide for itself.  
The president does not live in every state.  
I think some things should be up to each state.  
The president will not be in office forever.  
If a new president wants to change the law, they can.  
It is better for each state to decide.

Myspace is open to the public. People can see what is posted there. If you post on Myspace, you should know that others can see it. This includes school officials.

School officials saw the posts because they want to keep students safe. They have a job to protect students. If seeing the posts helps stop a school shooting, it is good.

It is different if officials look for bad things students do on Myspace just to punish them. That is an invasion of privacy.

But if it stops something bad from happening, it is not an invasion.

You should think before you post things online. Things on the internet stay there forever. 

People can find old posts even if they are trying to hide them. You should not post things you do not want others to see.
